tool_description: Generate emails or connection requests based on your prospect’s Linkedin profile. This tool is especially powerful for sales and marketing teams.
title: Messages Generation Tool

api_list.name: generateLinkedinMessages
api_list.description: Generate 5 different hyper personalized Linkedin connection messages instantly. You also have access to key data about your prospect easily.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://messages-generation-tool.p.rapidapi.com/connection_messages/{url}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "messages-generation-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.output_1: It goes without saying that your experience and qualifications are impressive. I’d be very happy to connect.
body.output_2: Whilst reading your bio, I noticed that you’re a professor at the Wharton School and a senior fellow of the University of Pennsylvania. I would like to know more about your work in finance, and what you believe is the future of the global economy.
body.output_3: Your experience in the financial services industry, and your work in the academic world, makes you a great fit for Queens' College. I am glad to see that you are part of the advisory board of Gramercy Fund Management. I’d love to connect with you.
body.output_4: It’s obvious that you’ve been very successful in your career. I think that’s great, you deserve every success and I wish you all the best.
body.output_5: I loved reading about your experience at Queens' College, Cambridge. I think it's really important to be driven by solving big problems. I'm very glad to see your efforts in leading cross-functional teams and delivering excellent software products for WeWin. Let's connect, cheers!

api_list.name: generateEmailOpeners
api_list.description: Generate 5 different hyper-personalized email openers instantly. You also have access to key data about your prospect easily.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://messages-generation-tool.p.rapidapi.com/email_generation/{url}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "messages-generation-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.output_1: I must say, your outstanding track record is impressive. I admire your achievements in the fashion industry, as well as your humanitarian work.
body.output_2: I must say, I enjoyed reading your bio - it’s very interesting and I got a lot of information about you. I hope that you will continue to do great things in the future and inspire us all.
body.output_3: I love the fact that you’re a mom. I think it’s an important thing to mention in your bio, especially when you have so many other successful ventures and achievements. I also love that you’re a partner, actor, singer, fashion designer and humanitarian. I think it shows that you have so many interests and passions yet are still able to balance them all
body.output_4: It’s obvious that you’re a very busy woman. I admire that you’re involved in charity and humanitarian work, it’s very admirable. I also like your fashion sense and your sense of style.
body.output_5: I went over your LinkedIn profile and I saw that you’re a mother, partner, actor, singer, film & television producer, fashion designer, bestselling author and humanitarian. I think it's awesome!
